title: 13-year-old killed after accidental shooting on Done Roven Rd in Augusta
content:
RICHMOND COUNTY, Ga. (WRDW/WAGT) -- A 13-year-old is dead after an apparent accidental shooting on Done Roven Road off Bennock Mill Road in South Augusta, according to Richmond County Coroner and Sheriff's Office.
Coroner Mark Bowen says emergency crews responded to the shooting just before 4:30 p.m. Friday and found Michael Caleb McNatt shot. McNatt was pronounced dead at Augusta University Medical Center two hours later.
Lieutenant Allan Rollins says investigators interviewed McNatt's friends and determined the shooting was accidental. No charges are expected at this time.
The teen's body is being taken to the GBI Crime Lab in Atlanta for an Autopsy Saturday.
The coroner's office says the investigation is in its early stages.
Check back for updates.
